title: Cell phone and short-term memory-operational def

content.question: Which of the following is an operational definition for short-term memory used in this study?

choices.label: Number of hours spent on a cell phone
Number of correct details remembered about world events
Number of participants surveyed in the study
Number of data points in the graph

content.answer: Number of correct details remembered about world events

skill.text: 2.C: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in non-experimental methodologies.
